markdownRemark.html: Help others discover right the questions to ask rather than assuming prior knowledge - or implying best next steps. Many are moving to digital commerce, communications and tools out of necessity - not choice. Without experience and expertise, this group may be less aware of what is possible. Good to keep in mind - especially now.

frontmatter.description: Help others discover right the questions to ask rather than assuming prior knowledge - or implying best next steps.
frontmatter.title: Help others discover right questions to ask
